files.README.md:
# Product Strategy Skills for Claude Code

7 product strategy skills, 2 specialist agents, and 1 command for opportunity discovery, growth loop design, monetization, and launch operations.

## Installation

```
/plugin marketplace add tjboudreaux/cc-plugin-product-strategist
/plugin install product-strategist@product-strategist-marketplace
```

## Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `product-opportunity-mapping` | Systematically scan cultural, platform, and behavioral shifts to find high-leverage consumer opportunities before committing to builds |
| `product-value-proposition` | Rapidly craft, prototype, and validate differentiated value propositions before committing engineering cycles |
| `product-behavior-signals` | Convert mixed-method research and live telemetry into actionable user insight loops that guide product bets |
| `product-growth-loops` | Design compounding acquisition, engagement, and retention loops tailored to consumer product or game ecosystems |
| `product-monetization` | Craft adaptable, user-first revenue systems spanning subscriptions, in-app economies, marketplaces, and token models |
| `product-launch-ops` | Run disciplined go-to-market experiments that compound insight, de-risk launches, and accelerate product-market fit |
| `product-strategy-to-ops` | Convert product strategy artifacts into actionable issues with dependencies |

## Agents

| Agent | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `product-strategist` | Applies product thinking frameworks to identify opportunities, validate propositions, design growth loops, and orchestrate launches |
| `product-ops-manager` | Manages daily product ops cadence for prioritization, execution planning, cycle detection, and velocity tracking |

## Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/product` | Run product analysis -- opportunities, value props, growth, or launch planning |

## License

MIT
